commit.message:
2003-09-25  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* gnu/java/nio/SelectorImpl.java
	(implSelect): Renamed from java_do_select.
	(select): Call native implSelect() and add support for Thread
	interruption.
	* gnu/java/nio/natSelectorImpl.cc
	(implSelect): Renamed from java_do_select.

From-SVN: r71781
